00050 #include "QualityImprover.hpp"
00051 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00052 
00053 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00054 
00058 QualityImprover::QualityImprover()
00059 {
00060   defaultOuterCriterion = new TerminationCriterion;
00061   defaultInnerCriterion = new TerminationCriterion;
00062   defaultOuterCriterion->add_iteration_limit( 1 );
00063   outerTerminationCriterion = defaultOuterCriterion;
00064   innerTerminationCriterion = defaultInnerCriterion;
00065 }
00066  
00067 QualityImprover::~QualityImprover()
00068 {
00069         delete defaultOuterCriterion;
00070         delete defaultInnerCriterion;
00071 }
00072     
00073 void QualityImprover::initialize_queue( Mesh* mesh,
00074                                         MeshDomain* domain,
00075                                         const Settings* settings,
00076                                         MsqError& err )
00077 {
00078   innerTerminationCriterion->initialize_queue( mesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00079   outerTerminationCriterion->initialize_queue( mesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00080 }
00081 
00082 } // namespace MESQUITE_NS
